rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a small vestibule and openable sliding door for wheelchair accessibility.
Lively living room designed in Chettinad style, with large windows facing east to welcome morning sunlight. Includes ample space for seating arrangements.
Adjacent to the kitchen; open plan concept integrated with living room. Wheelchair accessible layout.
Modern yet traditional Chettinad kitchen design with low counters and wide door openings for wheelchair access. Appliances are positioned for ease of use.
Spacious master bedroom ensuring ample natural light from east-facing windows. Includes built-in wardrobes with lower-level storage.
Secondary bedroom designed for guests; wheelchair accessible door and adaptable layout.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with grab bars, non-slip flooring, and easy-to-reach fixtures.
Small utility room adjacent to kitchen for storage of cleaning supplies or minor appliances.

openings.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible with ramp and automatic door mechanism.

openings.description: Two-car garage entrance on the ground floor, designed for smooth vehicle access.
Provides additional outdoor space and natural ventilation to the living room and bedrooms.

vastu_considerations.details: Main entrance is oriented towards the north or east, in accordance with Vastu principles for prosperity and positive energy.
Master bedroom positioned in the south-east corner to promote health and relaxation while guest bedroom is set in the south-west quadrant ensuring balanced energy flow.
